text: Xii soloferen bun ma, ɛ buru ratetaren donma nɛn. Xii singen na a li, ɛ buru rate seen12.15 burun nate sena: Lɛbɛnna na a ra naxan burun nagboma ayi.  bama nɛn ɛ banxine kui. Amasɔtɔ naxan na seen don burun nate seen naxan yi, keli xii singen ma han xii soloferede lɔxɔni, n na a kedima nɛn Isirayila yamaan yɛ.
